description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ca93","text":"This protocol details how to create studies in the Experiment Data Depot. guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3pl3c","text":"Line Name:  Line name should only have dash (-), underscore (_), or space ( ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9u4r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4spcn","text":"Part ID:  Make sure that your ICE registry part ID number is accessible to collaborators and that it is a strain, not a plasmid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avqf0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh49l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

While spaces (  ) are not forbidden, they cause issues with various data processing workflows, so spaces should be avoided.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"83c2i","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5qfi7","text":"Part ID: If you are including Part IDs, make sure that your strains are shared in the ICE that corresponds to the EDD you are using.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1m6ad","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"14sga","text":"Part ID:  Make sure that your ICE part # is accessible to collaborators and that it is a strain, not a plasmid.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5sqbe","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":3,"offset":44,"style":"bold"},{"length":3,"offset":49,"style":"bold"},{"length":3,"offset":58,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ejraf","text":"Replicate Count:  Replicate count of 3 adds -R1, -R2, and -R3. to the end of the Line Name, so additional replicate metadata is unnecessary.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"92b94","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":53,"offset":123}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9m9q4","text":"For more information about the Experiment Description files, click on the help button on the top right of the grey box or  https://public-edd.agilebiofoundry.org/describe/help/.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2v1eg","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"A3A8D5A6E8F546FA9FDA36B80FC5E23B","url":"https://public-edd.agilebiofoundry.org/describe/help/"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbc9f","text":"Drag-and-drop the Sample Experiment Description Example File into the dropzone on the Overview page.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":29},{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":86,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hwnna","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n8fn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"62o6v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68nln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc1n9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":202,"id":433406,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"EDD_study-3_overview_dropzone.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/phiabcj97.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/phh8bcj97.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/phh9bcj97.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/phh7bcj97.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck463","text":"Once you have acquired the data, go to the EDD Data Import protocol to import data into the EDD study.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":24}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"CB5CD0E6546411EB8E920A58A9FEAC2A","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bp2l6bd15gqe/v1"}}}}
